txt.en:
'Ho there, [placeholder], lend me your ear!

'There are many servants of Angmar scattered throughout the Ettenmoors. Search amongst their army for the tracker's badges. These can be found on the lowliest of their forces.

'If you collect some of these badges and return them to me, you will be honoured with a commendation of valour.'
'Your efforts are welcomed, [placeholder]. Please take this with my thanks. Quartermaster Ash at Gl√¢n Vraig will recognize you for your efforts in the Ettenmoors should you visit him.'
'I need more of the tracker's badges before I can bestow a Token of Valour upon you, [placeholder]. Keep hunting the enemy down.'
First Marshal Sathryth at Ost Ringdyr is collecting badges taken from Angmar's weakest forces.
Return tracker's badges to First Marshal Sathryth

Trackers can be found among the Enemy in the Ettenmoors.\n\nForces in the service to Angmar may each carry a seal of their station. Search among the enemy for these badges. First Marshal Sathryth at Ost Ringdyr has promised a reward for the badges you bring her.
